mapper.update: update rasberryPiMapping set rasberryPiID = #{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rasberryPiName = #{rasberryPiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rasberryPiModel = #{rasberryPiModel,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update rasberryPiMapping set rasberryPiName = #{rasberryPiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = DEFAULT where rasberryPiID = #{rasberryPiID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, rasberryPiID, rasberryPiName, createTime, updateTime, rasberryPiModel from rasberryPiMapping
